<em>Understanding the Web ecosystem</em>
<p>The 'Web Mechanics' competency is made up of the following skills:</p>
*  [https://wiki.mozilla.org/Learning/WebLiteracyStandard/Exploring/WebMechanics/URLs-IPaddresses-search-terms Using, and understanding the difference between, URLs, IP addresses and search terms]
* [https://wiki.mozilla.org/Learning/WebLiteracyStandard/Exploring/WebMechanics/keeping-up-to-date Keeping up-to-date with sources of information on the Web]
* [https://wiki.mozilla.org/Learning/WebLiteracyStandard/Exploring/WebMechanics/searching-in-different-ways Demonstrating the difference(s) between searching in different ways/contexts/sites]
